attributes.action: re examine the student EMA allowance Scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am a student and i am recieving £30 a week but as i am a full time student i do not have time for a job but that makes me limited to what i can do because of the current problem with jobs and i know many students my age suffer the same problem
i would love to learn to drive like many my age and mostly because its  easier to get to college and back because i live a great distance, and im not a big fan of busses.  This petition is to ask if there is a way of raising the weekly allowance to be able to support students will full time courses, and give us the chance to access further funding when needed
